content: hearts little quick a knitting pattern by anna hrachovec you ll need yarn about 8 yards of yarn in your choice of weight plus small amount of black yarn for eyes needles straight circular or double-pointed needles sized to your yarn choose a needle 2-3 sizes smaller than is normally recommended for the yarn you re using for a tight gauge other supplies stuffing tapestry needle notes this project is written in both flat and circular versions choose whichever you like gauge isn t important just make stitches tight enough so that stuffing won t show through depending on its size the finished project may be very small and not a suitable toy for small children abbreviations dpn s = double-pointed needle s p = purl k = knit p2tog = purl 2 stitches together k2tog = knit 2 stitches together round s = round s kfb = knit into the front and back of one st s = stitch es stitch knitting tips and tutorials can be found in the how-to section at mochimochiland com hearts by anna hrachovec mochimochiland com 1 flat pattern circular pattern cast on 2 stitches onto a needle cast on 4 stitches onto one dpn row 1 kfb twice 4 sts slide the stitches to the right end of the row 2 purl needle to work the the first round as an i- row 3 k1 kfb twice k1 6 sts cord row 4 purl round 1 kfb 4 times 8 sts row 5 k1 kfb k2 kfb k1 8 sts distribute the stitches onto 2 or 3 dpns to row 6 purl continue working in a round row 7 k1 kfb k4 kfb k1 10 sts round 2 knit row 8 purl round 3 kfb k2 kfb twice k2 kfb 12 sts row 9 k1 kfb k6 kfb k1 12 sts round 4 knit row 10 purl round 5 kfb k4 kfb twice k4 kfb 16 sts row 11 k1 kfb k8 kfb k1 14 sts round 6 knit row 12 purl round 7 kfb k6 kfb twice k6 kfb 20 sts row 13 k1 k2tog k4 turn to work these 6 round 8 knit stitches separately leaving the other 7 round 9 kfb k8 kfb twice k8 kfb 24 sts stitches on the needle to work later round 10 knit row 14 p1 p2tog twice p1 4 sts round 11 k2tog k4 place the next 12 sts on bind off 4 stitches and leave a tail of about a needle or holder pulling the working yarn 12 30cm weave the tail through the back tightly to continue the round with the stitches of the piece and reattach it to the next live on the last dpn k4 k2tog 10 sts stitch where you left off before turning now you will work the remaining 7 stitches row 15 k4 k2tog k1 6 sts row 16 p1 p2tog twice p1 4 sts bind off 4 stitches repeat the above pattern to make the other
